title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 34 - Motor Vehicle Liability Insurance Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 34 - Motor Vehicle Liability Insurance Reporting

State Regulations
§ 34.1 - Introduction
§ 34.2 - Definitions and general requirements
§ 34.3 - Reporting motor vehicle liability insurance notices (transactions)
§ 34.4 - Reporting time frames
§ 34.5 - Special procedures for initial loading
§ 34.6 - Negative verification (nvf) notices (transactions) initiated by dmv
§ 34.7 - System conversion
§ 34.8 - Assignment, maintenance and withdrawal of nys insurance company code
§ 34.9 - Technical filing specifications
§ 34.10 - Manual reporting for dealer and transporter registration classes
§ 34.11 - Warning on notice or acknowledgment of termination to insured
§ 34.12 - Exclusions
§ 34.13 - Applicability
§ 34.14 - Enforcement

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 34

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215[a], 313[2][c], [4], 318[1-a], [4], [9], 319[5], 370[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
